name: Space Brothers' Love
description:
Love is the universal language understood by all creatures. Even space-ones. Brothers' love is tough though. You play as an alien which has to protect his little brother from space-bullies, because ONLY YOU have permission to hit your brother!

(...and get points by it)

Game created during Warsaw Film School Game Jam by:

  • Adam "Chopin" Andrzejczak - production, design, vfx, gameplay
  • Piotr "Hordex" Żebrowski - gameplay, vfx
  • Ola "Zima" Lato - UI, design, vfx
  • Mateusz "Meti" Pilski, - gameplay, sounds (cc)
  • Dawid W. Mika - music
  • Artur "Archen" Ostrowski - story, additional programming

Controls:

  • W/S/A/D - movement
  • Left Mouse Button - slicing laser beam
  • Right Mouse Button - force of love :)
  • SPACE - dash-jump
  • Q - restart level
  • ESC - quit game
